snippet: All three indexes rose in January, but fell on Tuesday as the market received negative numbers on the progress of the economy and corporate earnings.
abstract: Wall Street closes a strong month narrowly mixed as weaker-than-expected economic reports surprise investors following a stream of positive data in recent months; stocks rallied in January on hopes the American economy will avoid the effects of a recession in Europe.
lead_paragraph: All three indexes rose in January, but fell on Tuesday as the market received negative numbers on the progress of the economy and corporate earnings.

headline.main: Equities End a Strong Month on a Mixed Note
headline.print_headline: Equities End a Strong Month on a Mixed Note
